welcome_message_body: Welcome to Southborough, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, historic buildings, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and appreciate all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's largest terminal and handles most of the international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles mostly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.
